name: Songline Analytics Private Limited
description: Developer of a data analysis platform designed to reduce application uninstalls. The company's data analysis platform uses an internal proprietary prediction engine that measures all huerstics and utilizes historical data to determine exactly which lot of users are going to uninstall an application in the next few days, enabling mobile application developers to engage with these users and prevent them from uninstalling.
one_liner: Developer of a data analysis platform designed to reduce application uninstalls. The company's data analysis platform uses an internal proprietary prediction engine that measures all huerstics and utilizes historical data to determine exactly which lot of users are going to uninstall an application in the next few days, enabling mobile application developers to engage with these users and prevent them from uninstalling.
